post.summary: Get a token for a user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: user to get a token for

200.description: API JSON Web token for specified user

post.description: Can make this call unauthorized, but must also send 'email' and 'token_id' in the request JSON

interval_count.description: Number of intervals in a period, for example with a monthly interval and interval_count of 1, customer charged every month

post.summary: Changes a service instance properties, can affect instance pricing if subscription.
Add a charge to a service-instance
Rejects a service-instance-cancellations for the user who created it

parameters.name: System Options
parameters.description: An array of System Options to create

get.summary: Gets a System File Options. Ids are 'front_page_image', 'brand_logo'

put.summary: Updates a System Option. Ids are 'front_page_image', 'brand_logo'
